column5: Private entrance and deck with beautiful Hill County views. 5 acres of grounds with roses, flowering bushes, seasonal creek, and two fire pits.  Located in the heart of the new wine country between Wimberley, Blanco, and Dripping Springs (the wedding venue capital of Texas)  Efficiency style apartment with a queen sized bed, bathroom with shower, dining tables indoor and outside for two, and kitchenette.   Additional outdoor seating area near creek.
column8: The Loft (Why stay in a hotel?)
